titles.title: Department of Veterans Affairs Information Technology Reform Act of 2019

Department of Veterans Affairs Information Technology Reform Act of 2019
Department of Veterans Affairs Information Technology Reform Act of 2019
Department of Veterans Affairs Information Technology Reform Act of 2019
Department of Veterans Affairs Information Technology Reform Act of 2019
Department of Veterans Affairs Information Technology Reform Act of 2019
A bill to improve the management of information technology projects and investments of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Reported by Senator Moran without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 423.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
